column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Monday released the minutes of its discount rate meetings from October 7 to November 6, 2002.      The minutes are attached.Attachment (75 KB PDF)2002 Monetary policyHome |News and eventsAccessibility Last update: December 23, 2002
